description: This Dart source file defines the BirthdaysService class which provides methods to add and watch birthday data stored in Firestore, a cloud-hosted NoSQL database. It interacts with the Firestore collection 'birthdays' and utilizes a Birthday model and FirebaseService for initialization checking.

classes.name: BirthdaysService
classes.description: A service class that provides Firestore-backed methods to add and monitor birthday data for an application.

methods.name: addBirthday
methods.description: Adds a birthday entry to the Firestore 'birthdays' collection if Firebase is initialized.

methods.name: watchBirthdays
methods.description: Returns a stream of birthday lists that updates in real-time, ordered by date, or an empty stream if Firebase isn't initialized.
